sc.server.gaming
Class GameRoom

java.lang.Object
  sc.server.gaming.GameRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
sc.api.plugins.host.IGameListener
public class GameRoom
extends java.lang.Object
implements sc.api.plugins.host.IGameListener

A wrapper for an actual GameInstance. GameInstances are provided by the plugins. Additional mapping data (Client2Player) will be stored here.

step

public void step(boolean forced)
          throws sc.api.plugins.exceptions.RescueableClientException
Parameters:
forced - If true, game will be started even if there are not enoug players to complete the game. This should result in a GameOver.
